import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './AboutUs.css'; const AboutUs = () => { const [isDarkMode, setIsDarkMode] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme'); if (savedTheme === 'dark') { setIsDarkMode(true); document.body.classList.add('dark'); } }, []); const toggleTheme = () => { const newMode = !isDarkMode; setIsDarkMode(newMode); localStorage.setItem('theme', newMode ? 'dark' : 'light'); if (newMode) { document.body.classList.add('dark'); } else { document.body.classList.remove('dark'); } }; return (

Our Mission

At PostingExpert, we believe that social media marketing should be accessible, efficient, and powerful for businesses of all sizes. Our mission is to empower marketers and entrepreneurs with AI-driven tools that simplify content creation and amplify their online presence.

We're committed to delivering innovative solutions that save time, increase engagement, and drive real business results through intelligent automation.
